title: Happyday Watch Face For Wear
summary: Happiness is always with you.The watch face will bring you lucky.
description: We want to bring you happiness with this watch face.This is the theme of a happy life.The sun in the picture could really move following time.Also the background color and the sun position would change according to the position of the sun.Another feature it that the bus is moving to the face.In the daytime,the bus is coming.In the evening,The bus is going away.Have a try pleaseFeatures:✔ Animatic ✔ Digital time only ✔ Customize temperature:F or C✔ Customize weather:Show or not✔ Time display:12 hours or 24 hours✔ Resolution:320*320✔ Round & Square Watch Face✔ Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360,  LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatchIf you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
descriptionHTML:
We want to bring you happiness with this watch face.This is the theme of a happy life.The sun in the picture could really move following time.Also the background color and the sun position would change according to the position of the sun.Another feature it that the bus is moving to the face.In the daytime,the bus is coming.In the evening,The bus is going away.
Have a try please


Features:
✔ Animatic
✔ Digital time only
✔ Customize temperature:F or C
✔ Customize weather:Show or not
✔ Time display:12 hours or 24 hours
✔ Resolution:320*320
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch

If you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482
Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
comments: Just a fun little watch face. It makes me smile.
